I am a professor of sociology at [University of Oregon](https://www.uoregon.edu/) where I also serve as the associate department head of the [sociology department](https://socialsciences.uoregon.edu/sociology). My work has appeared in *PNAS*, *Social Forces*, *Annual Review of Sociology*, *Social Networks*, among numerous others. I also co-edited [*The Oxford Handbook of Social Networks*](https://academic.oup.com/edited-volume/34294)*.* I research and teach courses on social networks, research methods, social theory, as well as culture & science.

You can find my CV [here](light_cv_02032025.pdf).
